actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend section 171(b)(1)(D) the Workforce Investment Act of 1998 to provide for training service and delivery innovation grants.

summary.text: Amends the Workforce Investment Act of 1998 to allow the use of certain demonstration and pilot project grant and contract funds for targeted innovations in access and delivery of training and employment services, emphasizing use of advanced technologies for connecting individuals to information and tools to upgrade skills.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 171(b)(1)(D) the Workforce Investment Act of 1998 to provide for training service and delivery innovation grants.
